[ C or U ] (a piece of) meat from the back of an animal near the tail or from the top part of the back legs See also
sirloin loins [ plural ] literary or humorous
the part of the body that is above the legs and below the waist, especially the sexual organs: the fruit of your loins (= your child/children)
